author: Special Correspondent
M Soundariya Preetha
text:
Religion

Sri Hanumad Jayanthi Mahotsava Committee: Sri Madhva Navarathri Mahotsavam, Sri Raghavendra Swamy Brindavanam, 6 p.m .

General

Avinashilingam University: Students’ seminar on Insights into Companies Act, 10 a.m.

Nirmala College for Women: Annual sports day, 2 p.m.

Sri Jayendra Saraswathy Maha Vidyalaya College of Arts and Science: Seminar on Corporate leadership skills, 10.30 a.m.

PSG College of Arts and Science: Gateway’16, GRD Auditorium, 9.30 a.m.

Rajiv Gandhi National Institute of Youth Development and Dr. NGP Arts and Science College: Sustainable programme awareness and prevention of high risk behaviour among youth, 10 a.m.

Dr. NGP Arts and Science College: Workshop on mathematical software, 9.30 a.m.; workshop on placement readiness, 9.30 a.m.

Sankara College of Science and Commerce: Workshop by Commerce Department, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Productivity Council: Quiz competition for college students, PSG Institute of Management, 9.30 a.m.

Pioneer College of Arts and Science: Fortra – an exhibition on foreign trade, 10 a.m.

Shri Nehru Vidyalaya Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Valedictory of SNV associations and prize distribution, 3 p.m.

Shri Nehru Maha Vidyalaya College of Arts and Science: Workshop on Tally, 9 a.m.

Maharaja Arts and Science College: Talk on career development, 10.30 a.m.

RVS Technical Campus: Workshop on PLC and SCADA, 9.15 a.m.
title: Engagements. Coimbatore
